text: The Great Outdoors is a 1988 American comedy movie directed by Howard Deutch and starring John Candy, Dan Aykroyd, Annette Bening (in her movie debut), Stephanie Faracy, Chris Young, Lucy Deakins, Lewis Arquette. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1988 adventure movies Category:1988 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about vacationing Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Deutch Category:Movies set in Wisconsin
title: The Great Outdoors (movie)
